#: Language implementations vary on the issue of missing input variables.
In this set of test cases, the input variable is left out of the definition,
and the generator would need to handle the language implementation.

msg: When given no name, it should greet the world!

cases.name: Alice
msg: When given 'Alice', it should greet Alice!

cases.name: Bob
msg: When given 'Bob', it should greet Bob!
When given an empty string it should have a space
and punctuation, though admittedly this is strange.
